original: A barrel of standard Imperial measurements, used to carry cargo on Guild ships
translate: A barrel of standard Imperial measurements, used to carry cargo on Guild ships

original: A well made wooden crate that carries the brand of the Nautical Guild
translate: A well made wooden crate branded with the Nautical Guild's seal

original: Ancient clay pottery covered in strange, ornate circular patterns
translate: Ancient clay pottery covered in strange, ornate circular patterns

original: This door appears to be barricaded from the other side
translate: This door appears to be barricaded from the other side

original: It cannot be opened from this side
translate: It cannot be opened from this side

original: The web of some giant arachnid
translate: The web of some giant arachnid

original: The piece of paper seems to contain a work order
translate: The piece of paper seems to contain a work order

original: and as can clearly be observed, the tunnel’s support pillar is close to giving in
translate: and as can clearly be observed, the tunnel’s support pillar is close to giving in

original: If this last piece of support was to be removed, it is highly likely that the tunnel would collapse completely
translate: If this last piece of support was to be removed, it is highly likely that the tunnel would collapse completely

original: continue the previous day’s work of expanding the tunnel eastwards
translate: continue the previous day’s work of expanding the tunnel eastwards

original: I believe you should be very close to breaking through
translate: I believe you should be very close to breaking through

original: Doing so will allow us to create a short-cut to the mine’s entrance and I don’t need to tell you how much this would improve logistics
translate: Doing so will allow us to create a short-cut to the mine’s entrance and I don’t need to tell you how much this would improve logistics

original: A barricade constructed from debris blocks this path
translate: A barricade constructed from debris blocks this path

original: It is too large to dismantle before retaking the city and for now you must find some way around it
translate: It is too large to dismantle before retaking the city and for now you must find some way around it

original: A portion of the cave has collapsed behind you
translate: A portion of the cave has collapsed behind you

original: There is no going back this way
translate: There is no going back this way

original: The mauled corpse of a giant spider
translate: The mauled corpse of a giant spider

original: A fresh grave with a simple marker made of sticks
translate: A fresh grave with a simple marker made of sticks

original: No name can be found upon it
translate: No name can be found upon it

original: The corpse belongs to a graying old man
translate: The corpse belongs to a greying, old man

original: His face is serene and there is nothing to indicate he did not die of natural causes
translate: His face is serene. There is nothing to indicate he did not die of natural causes

original: Leaning over the body however, you spot thin strands of some bizarre purplish fungal growth protruding from the man's mouth and nose
translate: Leaning over the body however, you spot thin strands of some bizarre purplish fungal growth protruding from the man's mouth and nose

original: Strange vines of some unknown, purplish growth bursts forth from the masonry
translate: Strange vines of some unknown, purplish growth bursts forth from the masonry

original: As you lean in, fine strands reach greedily towards you
translate: As you lean in, fine strands reach greedily towards you

original: You recoil in disgust and decide it’s best to not touch the growths
translate: You recoil in disgust and decide it’s best to not touch the growths

original: A body lies broken upon the ground
translate: A battered body lies broken upon the ground

original: Though it has been gnawed by hounds, it seems clear that this person fell or jumped from the cliffs above
translate: Though it has been gnawed by hounds, it seems clear that this person fell from a great height; the cliffs above

original: Old and ruined shipping crates litter this part of the cave
translate: Old and ruined shipping crates litter this part of the cave

original: Only smugglers would use a place like this to store their goods
translate: Only smugglers would use a place like this to store their goods

original: Perhaps there are other, similar caches to be found on the Outer Isles?
translate: Perhaps there are other, similar caches to be found on the Outer Isles?

original: A note is scrawled in crude letters
translate: A barely legible note is scrawled in crude letters

original: I cannot stand another meal of Salted Fish!
translate: I cannot stand another meal of salted fish!
There is a limit to how long a man can live on salted potatoes and salted perklin

original: Take head, or git a dagger in the eye ye cheap basterd
translate: Take head, or git a dagger in the eye ye cheap basterd

original: An oddly shaped container of some unknown design
translate: An oddly shaped container of some unknown design

original: The surface is smooth and metallic, but not of a material you recognize
translate: The surface is smooth and metallic, but not of a material you recognise

original: Though the artifact is without a scratch, it still somehow conveys impossible age
translate: Though the artifact is without a scratch, it still somehow conveys impossible age

original: A book lies open on the librarian’s desk
translate: A book lies open on the librarian’s desk

original: Brother Auran has once again made off with the key to the forbidden section, claiming it is ‘much more convenient for both me and him’ that he keeps it for the duration of his studies
translate: Brother Auran has once again made off with the key to the forbidden section, claiming it is ‘much more convenient for both me and him’ that he keeps it for the duration of his studies

original: He’s assured me it’s well hidden in his study in the eastern tower whilst not in use
translate: He’s assured me it’s well hidden in his study in the eastern tower whilst not in use

original: I’ll need to send lay-brother Theo to recover it next time Auran is sleeping
translate: I’ll need to send lay-brother Theo to recover it next time Auran is sleeping

original: The sea-caves lie abandoned and closed off
translate: The sea-caves lie abandoned and closed off

original: Scribbled in a shaky hand on ancient parchment is the following verse
translate: Scribbled in a shaky hand on ancient parchment is the following verse

original: Walk the path in humble fate Contemplate the hidden gate
translate: Walk the path in humble fate Contemplate the hidden gate

original: Let the watchers show the way Like time flows ‘round the wheel of day
translate: Let the watchers show the way Like time flows ‘round the wheel of day

original: To heed the silent sleepers call And enter into the Dreaming Hall
translate: To heed the silent sleepers call And enter into the Dreaming Hall

original: Ink and paper that appears to have been abandoned mid-use
translate: A pot of ink and sheet of paper that appears to have been abandoned mid-use

original: It seems someone was copying the mosaic on the floor
translate: It seems someone was copying the mosaic on the floor

original: The sarcophagus has the following description
translate: The sarcophagus has the following description

original: Carroleth the Manyfaced - First Grandmaster of the Order of the Crystal Eye
translate: Carroleth the Many-faced - First Grand Master of the Order of the Crystal Eye

original: Rothrax the Gray - Second Grandmaster of the Order of the Crystal Eye
translate: Rothrax the Grey - Second Grand Master of the Order of the Crystal Eye

original: Kalamar the Wise - Third Grandmaster of the Order of the Crystal Eye
translate: Kalamar the Wise - Third Grand Master of the Order of the Crystal Eye

original: The relief of this altarpiece seems to shift and squirm in the dancing light
translate: The relief of this altarpiece seems to shift and squirm in the dancing light

original: What’s more, there appears to be a hidden passage behind it
translate: What’s more, there appears to be a hidden passage behind it

original: No way of opening it can be seen nearby
translate: No way of opening it can be seen nearby

original: This cave opens up into the sheer cliff wall beneath the tower
translate: This cave opens up into the sheer cliff wall beneath the tower

original: Piled on the ledge is a great heap of ash that the wind occasionally carries away in great wisps
translate: Piled on the ledge is a great heap of ash that the wind occasionally carries away in great wisps

original: Carefully you prod the pile only to find a small handful of scorched human bones and teeth
translate: Carefully you prod the pile, only to find a small handful of scorched human bones and teeth

original: Looking around, you see a great in the ceiling above from which the ash appears to have been dumped
translate: Looking around, you see a grate in the ceiling above, from which the ash appears to have been dumped

original: A large square slab with small holes carved in it appears to be placed over some sort of shaft, sealing it shut
translate: A large square slab with small holes carved in it appears to be placed over some sort of shaft, sealing it shut

original: You attempt to look through one of the holes but are knocked back by an unbearable stench emitting from below
translate: You attempt to look into one of the holes but an unbearable stench permeates through from below; you are knocked back
A glimpse before you were overpowered, of something; was there something else…

original: The slab seems too heavy to lift and just as well
translate: The slab seems too heavy to lift. Just as well

original: You have an overwhelming feeling that what is trapped in the shaft below was not meant for mortal eyes to see and is best left in the dark
translate: you have an overwhelming feeling that what is trapped in the shaft below was not meant for mortal eyes to see and is best left in the inky blackness it calls home

original: A desk with a maritime navigation map
translate: A desk with a maritime navigation map laid on it

original: The map is labled 'The Outer Isles' and a course is drawn towards an island named 'Idra'
translate: The map is labelled "The Outer Isles" and a course is drawn towards an island named "Idra"

original: You recognize the corpse of one of the crew-mates
translate: You recognise the corpse of one of the crew mates

original: A young man of barely 16 years called Sullum
translate: A young man of barely 16 years called Sullum

original: The youth has been mauled to death by what you assume are the grotesquely altered rats you encounterd just minutes ago
translate: The unfortunate youth bears deep lacerations all over, presumably mauled to death by the grotesquely altered rats you encountered just moments ago

original: A grindstone used for sharpening weapons
translate: A grindstone used for sharpening weapons
A rope of a thousand uses

original: A torch hangs on the wall
translate: A torch hangs on the wall
A heavy- no wait, it's a light

original: Perhaps you can jump the gap?
You can climb down this wall
translate: You can climb down this wall

original: You can climb the wall ahead
translate: You can climb the wall ahead

original: A set of stairs leading to the deck above
translate: A set of stairs leading to the deck above

original: A set of stairs leading to the deck below
translate: A set of stairs leading to the deck below
A grate. Doesn’t seem so special

original: An pot that can be used for cooking
An oven that can be used for cooking
